title: Draconic Ancestry
content:
ic Ancestry is a Trait in Baldur's Gate 3. Traits provide unique abilities or effects and depend on the Character's Subrace. All playable Races in the game have subraces, except for Human, Githyanki and Half-Orc.

Draconic Ancestry Information

You have draconic ancestry. Choose one type of dragon from the Draconic Ancestry table. Your breath weapon and damage resistance are determined by the dragon type, as shown in the list:
